data.comment: The match is underway at Kazan Arena.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a Rostov throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
In the minute 1, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
Aleksandr Zuev of Rubin Kazan gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kazan.
Throw-in high up the field for Rostov in Kazan.
Corner awarded to Rostov.
In the minute 7, Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rubin Kazan drive forward but Soltmurad Bakaev is judged offside.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Throw-in for Rostov in their own half.
Rostov's Khoren Bayramyan has run offside.
In the minute 15, Roman Tugarev (Rostov) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Haitam Aleesami (Rostov) has received a yellow card from Pavel Kukuyan.
In the minute 18, Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
Throw-in for Rostov in the half of Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Rostov.
Attention is being given to Rostov’s Kento Hashimoto and play has been suspended briefly.
Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half?
In the minute 24, Ball safe as Rostov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 25, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kento Hashimoto, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Danil Glebov is the substitute for Rostov.
Rubin Kazan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in the half of Rostov.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Rostov goal kick.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Free kick Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 29, Rostov have a goal kick.
Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
Rubin Kazan are coming forward and Georgi Zotov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Rostov at Kazan Arena.
In Kazan Rostov's Roman Tugarev is caught offside.
At Kazan Arena, Mathias Normann for the away team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a Rubin Kazan throw-in in Rostov's half.
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
In the minute 34, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
Soltmurad Bakaev is booked for the home team.
In Kazan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Rostov needs to be cautious. Rubin Kazan have an attacking throw-in.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 36, Pavel Kukuyan awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Denis Makarov for the home team is judged to be offside.
Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
Rostov's Khoren Bayramyan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kazan.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Kazan to check on Oleg Shatov, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 44, Rubin Kazan's Oleg Shatov is back in action after a slight knock.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rostov's Roman Eremenko gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Rubin Kazan defender.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Can Rostov capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rubin Kazan's half?
Pavel Kukuyan awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Kazan.
The second-half has started.
Soltmurad Bakaev of Rubin Kazan is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 48, Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 51, Pavel Kukuyan signals a throw-in for Rubin Kazan, close to Rostov's area.
Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half?
Rostov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Goal! Khoren Bayramyan gives Rostov a 0-1 lead in Kazan.
Danil Glebov with an assist there.
Can Rostov capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 58, Roman Eremenko (Rostov) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
The home team have replaced Aleksandr Zuev with Kirill Kosarev. This is the first substitution made today by Leonid Slutskiy.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in the half of Rostov.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Rostov.
Rostov have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Rostov at Kazan Arena.
Valeri Karpin is making the team's second substitution at Kazan Arena with Pontus Almqvist replacing Roman Tugarev.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
In the minute 63, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
The away team replace Roman Eremenko with Armin Gigovic.
In the minute 63, Nikolay Poyarkov is replacing Haitam Aleesami for the away team.
Throw-in for Rostov close to the penalty box.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Rostov.
In the minute 66, Rostov's Mathias Normann breaks free at Kazan Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a Rubin Kazan throw-in in Rostov's half.
In the minute 66, Rubin Kazan have a dangerous throw-in.
Rostov will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Rubin Kazan.
Important block from the Rostov defence as Denis Makarov fires in a strike for Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 68, Oliver Abildgaard (Rubin Kazan) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kazan.
In the minute 69, Kirill Kosarev gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan make their second substitution with Ivan Konovalov replacing Darko Jevtic.
Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
Denis Makarov for Rubin Kazan has been booked by Pavel Kukuyan and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 71, Rostov's Denis Terentjev misses with an attempt on goal.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 72, Rostov to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Rostov drive upfield and Khoren Bayramyan gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Rubin Kazan defender.
Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
In the minute 74, Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a Rostov throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Great finish from Khoren Bayramyan to give Rostov a 0-2 lead.
In the minute 76, Pontus Almqvist instrumental with a fine assist.
Pavel Kukuyan awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half?
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Rostov.
Mikhail Merkulov is on a sub for Ilya Samoshnikov for Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 84, Rubin Kazan make their fourth substitution with Kirill Klimov replacing Soltmurad Bakaev.
Rostov needs to be cautious. Rubin Kazan have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Rostov goal kick.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in the half of Rostov.
The match at Kazan Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Mathias Normann, who is down injured.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Pontus Almqvist for Rostov drives towards goal at Kazan Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Rostov's Mathias Normann looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 88, Pavel Kukuyan blows against Rubin Kazan's Kirill Kosarev for offside.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Pavel Kukuyan awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Rostov.
Pavel Kukuyan will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
In Kazan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-2.
